a:r.a:t: So what we’re proposing here is creating a solution to help people secure their data. For people to want to use this solution, we think this solution needs to be easy to use to the point that it doesn’t interfere with how people use the information, and what they do with the documents.

First of all, the identification of what’s sensitive data versus what’s not needs to be smart and accurate enough, for starter. You don’t want the user to have to intervene and override all the time, and be involved in too much manual work dealing with FPs and FNs.

Secondly, once the solution has identified documents or data with sensitive personal info, the solution also needs to support how people want to secure their data. For some people, maybe they want to store the data offline on a USB stick. For others, maybe they don’t need to have a local backup copy and just want the document or data deleted automatically all the time—AFTER they are done viewing the document. For some other people, maybe they want the document to be automatically relocated to their Personal Vault on one of the cloud storage drives when they are done viewing the document.
